title: White Wedding
descriptions: "White Wedding" (1989) follows the story of Sarah, a high-society socialite who is set to marry a wealthy businessman. Her life takes a dramatic turn when she discovers that her fianc√© has a dark past, including a secret marriage and a child from a previous relationship. As the wedding approaches, Sarah grapples with the decision to go through with the union or expose the truth, which could shatter her social standing and the lives of those around her. The film explores themes of deception, loyalty, and the price of preserving one's image in a superficial society.
